name: Campfire (Blooker)
description:
Oh no! The kids at Camp Sandy Balls (real place, google it) have been practicing their fire starting skills too much and the whole place is alight! Only you, the camp's resident bucket, can save the day. Can you put out the fires quickly enough?! Only one way to find out.

Controls

Mouse and Keyboard:

  • WASD - Move
  • Mouse - Look
  • Left click
    • Hold to show aim arc
    • Let go to fire
  • Right click - Aim
  • Space - jump

X360 Controller:

  • Left stick - Move
  • Right stick - Look
  • Right trigger
    • Hold to show aim arc
    • Let go to fire
  • Left trigger - Aim
  • A - jump

Made by Amy, Evan, Paul, Dan, Mark and Anna for the Develop:Brighton Game Jam 2018
